title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.7 - Commingling human remains
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.7 - Commingling human remains

State Regulations

The cremation of remains of more than one deceased human
being in a retort at any one time is unlawful, except upon written
authorization signed by the persons making funeral arrangements and the persons
in control of disposition, and the signed consent of the crematory, which
record shall be retained in the permanent file of the
crematory. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 19

203.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
